title: Arc length formula
speech: Arc  Length is equal to the integral from a to b of the square root of 1 plus f prime, of x squared end root d x
pacedSpeech: Arc   Length is equal to the integral from a to b of the square root of 1 plus f prime, of x squared end root d x

title: Take the derivative of f(x)
speech: f prime, of x, is equal to 4 thirds 3 halves x raised to the 1 half power is equal to, 2 x raised to the 1 half power
pacedSpeech: f prime, of x, is equal to 4 thirds 3 halves x raised to the 1 half power is equal to, 2 x raised to the 1 half power

title: Plug the derivative into the integral with the given bounds
speech: Arc  Length is equal to the integral from 0 to 1 of the square root of 1 plus parentheses, 2 x raised to the 1 half power  squared end root d x
pacedSpeech: Arc   Length is equal to the integral from 0 to 1 of the square root of 1 plus , 2 x raised to the 1 half power  squared end root d x

title: Simplify $${\operatorname{f'}\left(x\right)}^2$$ and evaluate the integral
speech: Arc  Length is equal to the integral from 0 to 1 of the square root of 1 plus, parentheses 4 x  squared end root d x
pacedSpeech: Arc   Length is equal to the integral from 0 to 1 of the square root of 1 plus,  4 x  squared end root d x
